QuiPTsim 0.1.0
  • Reference

function generates set of RDS files containing n-gram matrices

create_simulation_data.Rd

function generates set of RDS files containing n-gram matrices

create_simulation_data(
  replications,
  seq_nums,
  seq_lengths,
  num_motifs,
  alphabet,
  path,
  title,
  save_files = FALSE
)

Arguments

replications

number of matrices' generation for each set of parameters
seq_nums

vector of sequences' numbers
seq_lengths

vector of sequences' lengths
num_motifs

vector of number of motifs to be injected
alphabet

elements used to build both sequence and motif
path

file path of RDS files
title

simulation name
save_files

triggers if RDS will be saved

Value

data frame with RDS files' details

Examples

alph <- 1L:4
reps <- 10
n_seq <- c(25)
l_seq <- c(8)
n_motifs <- c(1, 2)
path = "./"
create_simulation_data(reps, n_seq, l_seq, n_motifs, alph, path, "SEQ",FALSE)
#>    replication n_seq l_seq n_motifs
#> 1            1    25     8        1
#> 2            1    25     8        2
#> 3            2    25     8        1
#> 4            2    25     8        2
#> 5            3    25     8        1

#> 7            4    25     8        1
